title: 指定世界禁止破坏某种方块
author: n1529905750
txt_content:
Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - BossShop.open
    - chenghao.open
    - essentials.accept
    - essentials.build.*
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.tpa
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.changeprice
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - VJM.default
    - WowSuchCleaner.vault.capacity.9
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: ''
      suffix: ''

  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: 
    - -essentials.build.destroy.15
    - -essentials.build.place.15
    - -essentials.hat
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&f'
      suffix: ''


还有 更改权限组的提示 you were moved to the group XXX in XXX
